barker_notes.barker_summary: D. W. Anthony to Austin, February 3, 1833. Introducing his brother. Printing the Bexar remonstrance.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: On the Bexar remonstrance see Musquiz to Governor, Jan. 10, and Anthony to Austin, Jan. 20 and 25, 1833.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*D. W. Anthony to Austin, February 3, 1833. Introducing his brother. Printing the Bexar remonstrance.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="02-03-1833">Feby 3d 1833*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Col*/person_mentioned*.—*/p*
*p*Let this serve to introduce to your acquaintance, my brother *person_mentioned*Henry Anthony*/person_mentioned* who wises to become a *person_mentioned*Mexican Citizen*/person_mentioned*.— He visits *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* for the consequent donation of land which I assured him he would get by so doing.— My brother *person_mentioned*Jacob */person_mentioned*who has been here for some time is not well enough to go up at present and I therefore send the certificate of his having taken the constitutional oath etc. and also his name to a blank for a petition which I believe or hope will answer the same purpose as if present— I do not send you the Cash required on those occasions, but you can either draw on me immediately or wait a short time when it will be more convenient. I send you the proof of the first form of the Remonstrance in Spanish which has been waiting a week for correction. If this should be sufficiently correct, I suppose the other part can go to press without being sent to *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned*, as it is important they should be printed immediately. The balance will be in type by the return of my *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*Remonstrance (Translated) gives great satisfaction here. You will see from the *location_mentioned*paper*/location_mentioned*, what I have said on the subject of holding the convention at *location_mentioned*San Antonio*/location_mentioned*. I hope I shall hear from you frequently and soon—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*D. W. Anthony*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
